snippet: Documents acquired through a Freedom of Information Law request contradict statements that the comptroller’s office was only minimally involved in settling claims against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.
abstract: Office of New York State Comptroller Thomas P DiNapoli releases documents showing that its attorneys wrote portions of a controversial sexual harassment settlement involving Assemblyman Vito J Lopez; documents contradict earlier public statements that the comptroller's office was only minimally involved in the settlement agreement.
lead_paragraph: Documents acquired through a Freedom of Information Law request contradict statements that the comptroller’s office was only minimally involved in settling claims against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.

headline.seo: New York Comptroller’s Office Wrote Part of Vito Lopez Harassment Deal, E-Mails Say
headline.main: State Comptroller Office Wrote Part of Lopez Settlement, Documents Show
headline.print_headline: State Comptroller Office Wrote Part of Lopez Settlement, Documents Show
